mapper.select: select MENU_DETAIL_INDEX, MENU_DETAIL_NAME, MENU_DETAIL_ORDER, MENU_DETAIL_DESC, MENU_FUNCTIONG_PAGE from MENU_DETAIL where MENU_DETAIL_INDEX = #{menuDetailIndex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select MENU_DETAIL_INDEX, MENU_DETAIL_NAME, MENU_DETAIL_ORDER, MENU_DETAIL_DESC, MENU_FUNCTIONG_PAGE from MENU_DETAIL
